I use a different configuration for log4j during testing.

-----Original Message-----
From: Frank [mailto:frank.kelly@...] 
Sent: donderdag 19 augustus 2004 14:37
To: junit@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [junit] Stopping output of log4j statements to Console

Is there a way (via the Ant task property settings) to stop putting 
all the log4j output to the console in addition to the log files 
where I am logging it?

Our unit test suite takes many hours to complete and I believe it 
would be faster if it just logged it to the files,

Best,

-Frank
